summary: Barbie is an artist who paints her way out of a castle to save her prince.
cast: Kelly Sheridan|Anjelica Huston|Cree Summer|Ian James Corlett|Mark Hildreth|David Kaye|Peter Kelamis|Russell Roberts|Christopher Gaze|Terry Klassen|Chantal Strand|Danny McKinnon|Britt McKillip|Jocelyne Loewen|Dale Wilson
title: Barbie Rapunzel
